# Ex04 Places Around Me
## Date: 112.12.2025
## Ref no: 25018976

## AIM
To develop a website to display details about the places around my house.

## DESIGN STEPS

### STEP 1
Create a Django admin interface.

### STEP 2
Download your city map from Google.

### STEP 3
Using ```<map>``` tag name the map.

### STEP 4
Create clickable regions in the image using ```<area>``` tag.

### STEP 5
Write HTML programs for all the regions identified.

### STEP 6
Execute the programs and publish them.

## CODE
~~~
<!-- Image Map Generated by http://www.image-map.net/ -->
<img src="map.png" usemap="#image-map">

<map name="image-map">
    <area target="" alt="jalagamparai falls" title="jalagamparai falls" href="jalagamparai falls.html" coords="661,336,552,476" shape="rect">
    <area target="" alt="urgoundanur falls" title="urgoundanur falls" href="urgoundanur falls.html" coords="1671,716,78" shape="circle">
    <area target="" alt="church " title="church " href="church.html" coords="106,420,81" shape="circle">
</map>
~~~
church.html
~~~
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>CHURCH</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="pink">
    <h1 align="center">
        <font color="red"><b>TIRUPATTUR</b></font>
    </h1>
    <h3 align="center">
        <font color="blue"><b>CHURCH</b></font>
    </h3>
    <hr size="3" color="red">
    <p align="justify">
        <font face="Georgia" size="5">
            A church is a sacred place of worship and a community center for Christians.
            It is typically a building designed for Christian religious activities, services, and gatherings, although the term "church" also refers to the global community of Christian believers. 
            Inside, common features may include an altar, pews for the congregation, a pulpit for sermons, and sometimes stained-glass windows depicting stories from the Bible.
            the church serves as a place for people to come together in fellowship, support one another, grow spiritually through prayer and study, and carry out charitable work in their communities.
        </font>
    </p>
</body>
</html>
~~~
jalagamparai.html
~~~
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>JALAGAMPARAI FALLS</title>
</head>
<body bgcolor="pink">
    <h1 align="center">
        <font color="red"><b>TIRUPATTUR</b></font>
    </h1>
    <h3 align="center">
        <font color="blue"><b>JALAGAMPARAI FALLS</b></font>
    </h3>
    <hr size="3" color="red">
    <p align="justify">
        <font face="Georgia" size="5">
            Jalagamparai Falls, a serene cascade in Tamil Nadu's Eastern Ghats near Yelagiri, offers a refreshing natural retreat with its 15-meter drop, fed by the seasonal Attaru River, attracting trekkers and nature lovers with its lush surroundings, nearby temples (Shiva & Vishnu), and opportunities for a cool dip in the plunge pool, though visitors should time their visit (post-monsoon is best) and be prepared for basic facilities and a short trek/drive to enjoy this picturesque spot. 
        </font>
    </p>
</body>
</html>
~~~~
